answers.author: Stephen Pauken
answers.text:
Michelle, send me an email message at spauken@cityofbisbee.com and I can provide you with a contact in AZ.


Michelle, send me an email message at spauken@cityofbisbee.com and I can provide you with a contact in AZ.

answers.author: Rachel Massaro
answers.text:
We are currently working on the largest multi-jurisdictional collaborative procurement of renewable energy in the country, with the County of Santa Clara as lead agency.   All solicitation & procurement documents, including the PPA (which I've attached here), are posted on our website (www.jointventure.org/renewableenergyprocurement) along with additional resources.  You can also contact me if you'd like more details (Rachel Massaro, massaro@jointventure.org).

author: Michelle Crandall
text: In search of an executed power purchasing agreement or lease agreement for solar arrays that specifies the responsibilities of the third-party owner.
title: Solar PPA/Lease Example
